info.title: Ethereum Beacon Chain API
info.description: API for interacting with the Ethereum 2.0 Beacon Chain

get.summary: Get the root of a given state

parameters.name: state_id
parameters.description: State identifier which can be a slot number, an epoch number, a block root, or 'genesis', 'head'  (default is 'head').

200.description: Successful response with state root information

root.description: The root of the specified state.
